or most likely to bind to a Target typically a protein receptor or enzyme so think of it as a lock and key model
where the protein is the lock and The small molecules are the compounds of the keys basically want to test tens of
thousands of keys against the lock to see which may fit and which may have the ability to activate or deactivate the
mechanism so back in 2013 our colleagues in computational chemistry came with a
request to dock 10 million compounds against a common Target that had been identified in a number of cancer related
Pathways now this seems simple enough at first until we started to do the calculation and we figured that in order

Cognito helps mobile developers build applications for a modern era of
multiple devices where customers want access to the same data to the same

three major components identity synchronization and a set of robust
